item.title: LDaCA Newsletter Quarter 2 2024
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: Back to Newsletters <!DOCTYPE html> LDaCA Newsletter — Quarter 2 2024 Campaign URL Copy Twitter 0 tweets Subscribe Past Issues RSS Translate English العربية Afrikaans беларуская мова български català 中文（简体） 中文（繁體） Hrvatski Česky Dansk eesti keel Nederlands Suomi Français Deutsch Ελληνική हिन्दी Magyar Gaeilge Indonesia íslenska Italiano 日本語 ភាសាខ្មែរ 한국어 македонски јазик بهاس ملايو Malti Norsk Polski Português Português - Portugal Română Русский Español Kiswahili Svenska עברית Lietuvių latviešu slovenčina slovenščina српски தமிழ் ภาษาไทย Türkçe Filipino украї́нська Tiếng Việt Read about the new case study and blog post up on our website, our draft project plan, a recap of the ARDC Comp Skills Summer School 2024 and more!

item.title: LDaCA Newsletter Quarter 1 2024
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: Back to Newsletters <!DOCTYPE html> LDaCA Newsletter — Quarter 1 2024 Campaign URL Copy Twitter 0 tweets Subscribe Past Issues RSS Translate English العربية Afrikaans беларуская мова български català 中文（简体） 中文（繁體） Hrvatski Česky Dansk eesti keel Nederlands Suomi Français Deutsch Ελληνική हिन्दी Magyar Gaeilge Indonesia íslenska Italiano 日本語 ភាសាខ្មែរ 한국어 македонски јазик بهاس ملايو Malti Norsk Polski Português Português - Portugal Română Русский Español Kiswahili Svenska עברית Lietuvių latviešu slovenčina slovenščina српски தமிழ் ภาษาไทย Türkçe Filipino украї́нська Tiếng Việt Read about our Graduate Digital Research Fellowship, ARDC's upcoming Computational Skills Summer School, our 2023 ALS conference activities and more!
